Name.BusinessNameLine1: WILLIAM MCMANNIS & A HASKELL EDUCATION TRUST

SummaryOfDirectCharitableActy.Description1: 139 EDUCATIONAL GRANTS TO STUDENTS ATTENDING COLLEGES, UNIVERSITIES AND SPECIALIZED SCHOOLS.

AppicationSubmissionInfo.RecipientName: PNC WEALTH MANAGEMENT ATTN ANN O'NE
AppicationSubmissionInfo.FormAndInfoAndMaterials: APPLICATIONS ARE SUBMITTED TO THE TRUST THROUGH THE FINANCIAL AID OFFICE OF SCHOOL BEING ATTENDED BY THE APPLICANT.
AppicationSubmissionInfo.SubmissionDeadlines: AS REQUIRED BY THE APPLICANT'S SCHOOL TO MEET TIME DEADLINES FOR FINANCIAL AID.
AppicationSubmissionInfo.RestrictionsOnAwards: MAY INCLUDE, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, TUITION, FEES, ROOM, BOARD, BOOKS AND OTHER NECESSITIES, AT THE DISCRETION OF THE TRUSTEE.
